35 #include <lidar_segmentation/lidar_segmentation.h>
36 #include <lidar_segmentation/clustering.h>
37 #include "calibration/visualization_rviz_lms.h"
38 #include <visualization_msgs/Marker.h>
39 
47 vector<visualization_msgs::Marker> createTargetMarkers(vector<ClusterPtr>& clusters_nn, vector<ClusterPtr>& circlePoints, Point sphere )
48 {
49 
50  static Markers marker_list;
51 
52  //Reduce the elements status, ADD to REMOVE and REMOVE to delete
53  marker_list.decrement();
54 
55  // Create a colormap
56  class_colormap colormap("hsv",10, 1, false);
57 
58  visualization_msgs::Marker marker_ids_scan;
59  visualization_msgs::Marker marker_ids_circle;
60  visualization_msgs::Marker marker_ids_sphere;
61 
62  visualization_msgs::Marker marker_clusters_scan;
63  visualization_msgs::Marker marker_clusters_circle;
64  visualization_msgs::Marker marker_sphere;
65 
66  marker_ids_scan.header.frame_id = "/my_frame";
67  marker_ids_scan.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
68  marker_ids_circle.header.frame_id = "/my_frame";
69  marker_ids_circle.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
70  marker_ids_sphere.header.frame_id = "/my_frame";
71  marker_ids_sphere.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
72 
73  marker_clusters_scan.header.frame_id = "/my_frame";
74  marker_clusters_scan.header.stamp = marker_ids_scan.header.stamp;
75  marker_clusters_circle.header.frame_id = "/my_frame";
76  marker_clusters_circle.header.stamp = marker_ids_circle.header.stamp;
77  marker_sphere.header.frame_id = "/my_frame";
78  marker_sphere.header.stamp = marker_sphere.header.stamp;
79 
80  marker_ids_scan.ns = "ids_scan";
81  marker_ids_scan.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
82  marker_ids_circle.ns = "ids_circle";
83  marker_ids_circle.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
84  marker_ids_sphere.ns = "ids_sphere";
85  marker_ids_sphere.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
86 
87  marker_clusters_scan.ns = "clusters_scan";
88  marker_clusters_scan.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
89  marker_clusters_circle.ns = "clusters_circle";
90  marker_clusters_circle.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
91  marker_sphere.ns = "sphere";
92  marker_sphere.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
93 
94  marker_ids_scan.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::TEXT_VIEW_FACING;
95  marker_ids_circle.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::TEXT_VIEW_FACING;
96  marker_ids_sphere.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::TEXT_VIEW_FACING;
97 
98  marker_clusters_scan.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::SPHERE_LIST;
99  marker_clusters_circle.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::LINE_STRIP;
100  marker_sphere.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::SPHERE_LIST;
101 
102  marker_ids_scan.scale.x = 0.1;
103  marker_ids_scan.scale.y = 0.1;
104  marker_ids_scan.scale.z = 0.1;
105  marker_ids_circle.scale.x = 0.1;
106  marker_ids_circle.scale.y = 0.1;
107  marker_ids_circle.scale.z = 0.1;
108  marker_ids_sphere.scale.x = 0.1;
109  marker_ids_sphere.scale.y = 0.1;
110  marker_ids_sphere.scale.z = 0.1;
111 
112  marker_clusters_scan.scale.x = 0.05;
113  marker_clusters_scan.scale.y = 0.05;
114  marker_clusters_scan.scale.z = 0.05;
115  marker_clusters_circle.scale.x = 0.03;
116  marker_sphere.scale.x = 1.07;
117  marker_sphere.scale.y = 1.07;
118  marker_sphere.scale.z = 1.07;
119 
120  marker_ids_scan.color.a = 1.0;
121  marker_ids_scan.color.r = 1.0;
122  marker_ids_scan.color.g = 1.0;
123  marker_ids_scan.color.b = 1.0;
124  marker_ids_circle.color.a = 1.0;
125  marker_ids_circle.color.r = 1.0;
126  marker_ids_circle.color.g = 1.0;
127  marker_ids_circle.color.b = 1.0;
128  marker_ids_sphere.color.a = 1.0;
129  marker_ids_sphere.color.r = 1.0;
130  marker_ids_sphere.color.g = 1.0;
131  marker_ids_sphere.color.b = 1.0;
132 
133 
134  for ( uint i = 0; i< clusters_nn.size() ; i++)
135  {
136  ClusterPtr cluster_nn = clusters_nn[i];
137 
138  std_msgs::ColorRGBA color = colormap.color(i);
139 
140  //Place in the marker every point belonging to the cluster "i"
141  for(uint h=0;h<cluster_nn->support_points.size();h++)
142  {
143  geometry_msgs::Point pt;
144  pt.x=cluster_nn->support_points[h]->x;
145  pt.y=cluster_nn->support_points[h]->y;
146  pt.z= cluster_nn->support_points[h]->z;
147 
148  marker_clusters_scan.points.push_back(pt);
149  marker_clusters_scan.colors.push_back(color);
150  }
151 
152  marker_ids_scan.pose.position.x = cluster_nn->centroid->x;
153  marker_ids_scan.pose.position.y = cluster_nn->centroid->y;
154  marker_ids_scan.pose.position.z = 1.3;
155 
156  //text
157  boost::format fm("%d");
158  fm % cluster_nn->id;
159 
160  marker_ids_scan.text = fm.str();
161  marker_ids_scan.id = cluster_nn->id;
162 
163  marker_list.update(marker_ids_scan);
164  marker_list.update(marker_clusters_scan);
165 
166  } //end for
167 
168  //circle fit
169 
170  for ( uint i = 0; i< circlePoints.size() ; i++)
171  {
172  ClusterPtr cluster_circle = circlePoints[i];
173 
174  std_msgs::ColorRGBA color = colormap.color(i);
175 
176  //Place in the marker every point belonging to the cluster "i"
177  for(uint h=0;h<cluster_circle->support_points.size();h++)
178  {
179  geometry_msgs::Point pt;
180  pt.x=cluster_circle->support_points[h]->x;
181  pt.y=cluster_circle->support_points[h]->y;
182  pt.z= 0;
183 
184  marker_clusters_circle.points.push_back(pt);
185  marker_clusters_circle.colors.push_back(color);
186  }
187 
188  marker_ids_circle.pose.position.x = cluster_circle->centroid->x;
189  marker_ids_circle.pose.position.y = cluster_circle->centroid->y;
190  marker_ids_circle.pose.position.z = 1.5;
191 
192  //text
193  boost::format fm("%d");
194  fm % 1.0;
195 
196  marker_ids_circle.text = fm.str();
197  marker_ids_circle.id = 1.0;
198 
199  marker_list.update(marker_ids_circle);
200  marker_list.update(marker_clusters_circle);
201 
202  } //end for
203 
204  //sphere
205 
206  if(sphere.x!=0)
207  {
208  std_msgs::ColorRGBA color = colormap.color(0);
209 
210  geometry_msgs::Point pt;
211  pt.x=sphere.x;
212  pt.y= sphere.y;
213  pt.z= sphere.z;
214  cout<<"x "<<pt.x<<endl;
215  cout<<"y "<<pt.y<<endl;
216  cout<<"z "<<pt.z<<endl;
217  marker_sphere.points.push_back(pt);
218  marker_sphere.colors.push_back(color);
219 
220  marker_ids_sphere.pose.position.x = 0;
221  marker_ids_sphere.pose.position.y = 0;
222  marker_ids_sphere.pose.position.z = 0;
223 
224  //text
225  boost::format fm("%d");
226  fm % 1.0;
227 
228  marker_ids_sphere.text = fm.str();
229  marker_ids_sphere.id = 1.0;
230 
231  marker_list.update(marker_ids_sphere);
232  marker_list.update(marker_sphere);
233  }
234 
235  //Remove markers that should not be transmitted
236  marker_list.clean();
237 
238  //Clean the marker_vector and put new markers in it;
239  return marker_list.getOutgoingMarkers();
240 
241 } //end function
